original_title: Sri Lankan rupee at 304.30/90 against the US dollar, bond yields up at close
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 304.30/90 against the US dollar in the spot market on Tuesday, dealers said while bonds yields were unchanged.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 26.80/27.00 percent up from 26.40/60 percent, at Monday’s close.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 closed at 29.25/30.00 percent, up from 28.30/29.25 per cent at last close.
The rupee closed at 304.30/90 against the US dollar in the spot market on Tuesday stronger from the day before close at 306.30/50 rupees. (Colombo/May23/2023)
